channel.title: (Delta) Not Refreshing Points and Coins
channel.description: When I buy something using Assault points, Pest Control Points, donator points, or even coins, it doesn't refresh my coin stack until I log out and log back in. Also, when I use my donator points, I get two of the same item. How do I fix this? I'm not really sure how to fix this.

item.title: (Delta) Not Refreshing Points and Coins
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Due to this being delta, you must update the inventory, player, etc. manually.

Read full topic

item.title: (Delta) Not Refreshing Points and Coins
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

don’t they have a boolean like:
updateRequired = true;
? For the exact reason,
as for the buy 2, it’s something with your buy item method. Can’t say what, as I’m not looking at your code.

Read full topic
